description:
Tendo Civil Security Corporation (天童 民間警備会社, てんどう みんかんけいびかいしゃ, Tendou Minkankeibikaisha) is an organization owned by http://anidb.net/ch62149 [Tendou Kisara].
According to Kisara, the president of the corporation, Tendou Civil Security would not be what it is today if not for http://anidb.net/ch60244 [Satomi Rentarou] and http://anidb.net/ch60242 [Aihara Enju], along with herself, making it a three-man team in the year 2030; the year Rentaro became a Promoter. The corporation`s exact founding date, however, remains unclear.
As a relatively new corporation, Tendou Civil Security`s existence is not known by many. The corporation is located on the second floor of a building near the city. Below the corporation, on the first floor, the tenant runs a gay bar, whilst the second floor tenant runs a cabaret, and lastly; the fourth floor, does black market finance. The inside of the corporation is spacious, containing three desks, with a multitude of supplies on top of them, two bookshelves, one by the window and the other by the door, and lastly, a board with several papers hanging, and a phone next to Kisara`s desk.
name: Tendou Minkankeibikaisha
